scripts.db:reset: pnpm dlx sst shell pnpm dlx tsx src/lib/drizzle/seed/reset.ts
scripts.db:seed:e2e: pnpm dlx sst shell pnpm dlx tsx src/lib/drizzle/seed/e2e/index.ts
scripts.db:seed:expenses: pnpm dlx sst shell pnpm dlx tsx src/lib/drizzle/seed/expenses.ts
scripts.ai:eval: pnpm dlx sst shell braintrust eval ./src/ai/__tests__
scripts.test: pnpm dlx sst shell -- bun test
